text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Define Kakashi’s general proportions. Draw his head and a line through the figure.
Draw the neck and body of the boy.
Add guidelines for Kakashi’s arms, legs, feet and facial features.
Draw shapes for Kakashi’s trousers, arms, hands, hair and ear.
Sketch the shapes of the clothes, feet, fingers, hair and eye. Add the headband and parts of the jacket.
Add more detail to the clothes. Draw toes and hair.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Kakashi, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add details. Erase all guidelines.
